long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neflody: Discover new niche music through Spotify🍑

Tutorial and comprehensive guide 📔
can be found on neflody.com

Elevate your Spotify experience with Neflody—a free Chrome extension offering personalized music recommendations, customizable themes, and effortless playlist management. Explore new genres, curate unique playlists, and discover new music.

Drawing inspiration from "nefs" (نفس) — the Arabic word for essence of self and soul — this Chrome extension tries to transcend ordinary listening experiences by connecting you with niche music. 🍃 With Neflody, each recommendation is a step closer to uncovering the soundtrack of your nefs, curated by you😅
Reshape your playlists, customize to your heart's content 
and re-discover Spotify by enhancing your experience with Neflody 🪄

Why choose Neflody? 🌌
🌠Everything is free! Free recommendations, no premium Spotify account needed.
😸Immediate gratification: Click to add tracks to your shoppinglist🛒 directly from search results. Enjoy 30s previews and add to your playlist with a simple click on the album art or track title for more recommendations.
🎧Curate recommendations:  Listen to 30s snippets of songs before making the choice to add them to your playlist 🛒
🗑️Retrieve deleted tracks easily from the recycle bin.
🎨Make it yours with customizable themes and gradient backgrounds.
🗺️Untapped Musical Landscapes: With the popularity slider you can look for more or less popular tracks. Discover new genres, new artists, new songs and have fun with it💫
🍃Playlists and Recommendations: Your playlists and recommendations are just a few clicks away. Add tracks effortlessly by their ID or URL, creating a playlist that resonates with you.
💐Crafted for the curious: For those who seek beyond the charts, Neflody is your compass in the vast universe of sound. Join the fun and start curating your playlist🪄🧸
